article_title: Columbia woman’s harp comforts those ill or dying
article_text: Did you sleep last night? Annie Burgard asked gently, looking into Jack Davis’ gray eyes. Davis has been in and out of Palmetto Health Richland since a diagnosis of acute myeloid leukemia seven months ago.

Davis has been in and out of Palmetto Health Richland since a diagnosis of acute myeloid leukemia seven months ago.
Did you sleep last night?
Annie Burgard asked gently, looking into Jack Davis’ gray eyes.
